name: Briggs&StrattonEngineExpert
0:
”Alexa, open Briggs Engine Expert.”
”Alexa, ask Briggs Engine Expert to help me do an oil change.”
”Alexa, ask Briggs Engine Expert to help me find the right oil to use in my mower.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: briggs engine expert
Developer Terms of Use
des:
A healthy lawn mower engine starts easier, lives longer and avoids costly repairs. That’s why Briggs & Stratton is here with tips, advice and instruction to help you maintain your walk-behind lawn mower.

• Need to know what oil to use and how much of it to use? Ask Alexa.
• Want to know how to do an easy oil change that's fast and mess-free? Ask Alexa.

As the world’s largest manufacturer of small engines for outdoor power equipment, Briggs & Stratton knows a thing or two about lawn mower engine maintenance. 

Briggs & Stratton Engine Expert brings the power of Alexa to your garage. This easy-to-use technology lets you roll up your sleeves and get to work. You’ll be done in no time, and you’ll be rewarded with a healthy, long-lived, easier starting mower.

Just say “open Briggs Engine Expert,” and Alexa will guide you through some easy maintenance tips.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
